PAL.NAME: Dynamics CRM 2013 Back End Role
PAL.DESCRIPTION: Basic Monitoring for the Dynamics CRM 2013 Back End role

ANALYSIS.NAME: CRM Async Service Workflow Operations Outstanding
ANALYSIS.DESCRIPTION: The current number of Workflow operations oustanding, including in-memory queued items.

ANALYSIS.NAME: CRM Async Service Workflow Operations Completion Throughput
ANALYSIS.DESCRIPTION: Completion throughput of Workflow operations.

ANALYSIS.NAME: CRM Async Service Workflow Operations Executing
ANALYSIS.DESCRIPTION: The current number of Workflow operations being processed by asynchronous handlers.

ANALYSIS.NAME: CRM Async Service Workflow Operations Failed
ANALYSIS.DESCRIPTION: The total number of Workflow operations failed.

ANALYSIS.NAME: CRM Async Service Workflow - Average time spent in operation
ANALYSIS.PRIMARYDATASOURCE: \CRM Async Service(mscrmasyncservice)\Workflow - Average time spent in operation

DATASOURCE.NAME: \CRM Async Service(mscrmasyncservice)\Workflow - Average time spent in operation
DATASOURCE.EXPRESSIONPATH: \CRM Async Service(mscrmasyncservice)\Workflow - Average time spent in operation

CHART.CHARTTITLE: \CRM Async Service(mscrmasyncservice)\Workflow - Average time spent in operation
CHART.DATASOURCE: \CRM Async Service(mscrmasyncservice)\Workflow - Average time spent in operation

ANALYSIS.DESCRIPTION: Workflow - Average time spent in operation.

PAL.QUESTION: Maximum Async Operations Troughput per Server

ANALYSIS.DESCRIPTION: Info

ANALYSIS.NAME: CRM Sandbox Host % CPU Usage
ANALYSIS.DESCRIPTION: The total CPU percentage used by all Sandbox Worker processes.

ANALYSIS.NAME: CRM Sandbox Host % Worker Processes Crashed
ANALYSIS.DESCRIPTION: The percentage of Sandbox Worker processes that have crashed.

ANALYSIS.NAME: CRM Sandbox Host % Worker Processes Terminated
ANALYSIS.DESCRIPTION: The percentage of Sandbox Worker processes that have been terminated, due to excessive resource usage or no response.

ANALYSIS.NAME: CRM Sandbox Host % Assembly Cache Hits
ANALYSIS.DESCRIPTION: The assembly cache hit rate percentage.
